entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 p.m. PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries or rain this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023
